subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 26 points, including a go-ahead layup with 3.2 seconds left, and the Heat scrambled late to beat the Magic and extend their winning streak to 16 games.
snippet: LeBron James scored 26 points, including a go-ahead layup with 3.2 seconds left, and the Heat scrambled late to beat the Magic and extend their winning streak to 16 games.
